Method Detail

createSchema

public EntitySchemaStatus createSchema(EntityFacade entityFacade)
Creates the schema if it does not already exist. If it does exist, we catch the HInvalidRequestException and return an EntitySchemaStatus with EntitySchemaStatus.SchemaResult.NOT_MODIFIED

Parameters:
entityFacade -
Returns:
EntitySchemaStatus with EntitySchemaStatus.SchemaResult.CREATED if successful
